Add all endpoints = all callable URL of the API, and link them to the good functions :return: Nothing

static add_bad_method_info(result_json: Dict, good_method_instead: str = None) → Dict[source]¶

Add error values to the result_json if method is bad :param result_json: The result json/dict to which to add standard values :param good_method_instead: the method that should be used by the resquest :return: the modified result_json

add_endpoint(endpoint=None, endpoint_name=None, handler=None)[source]¶

Add one endpoint to the flask application. Accept GET, POST and PUT. :param endpoint: Callable URL. :param endpoint_name: Name of the Endpoint :param handler: function to execute on call on the URL :return: Nothing

Hash the picture, generate a BMP file, enqueue it, return the result_json with relevant values :param queue: Queue to add the picture :param file: the file provided by the client :param result_json: The result json/dict to which to add standard values :return: the modified result_json

ping(*args) → Dict[source]¶

Handle a ping request on server side. Creates a pong answer :param args: None is required :return: The result json (pong)

request_similar_picture() → Dict[source]¶

Handle a request of one picture, to return a list of similar pictures :return: The result json (status of the request, etc.)

run()[source]¶

Final action to call to run the flask process, which generate endpoints, and so. Handle SLL Certificate, if they are provided = use them, else = self sign a certificate on the fly :return: no return (continuously executing. Return error code if stopped and so)
